ingredients.ingredient: 2 (8 ounce) containers whipped topping (such as Cool Whip®), thawed
1 (12 ounce) jar hot fudge ice cream topping, warmed
1 (12 ounce) jar caramel ice cream topping
¼ cup chopped pecans, or to taste

cookingTips: Arrange ice cream sandwiches in single layer, then cover entirely with whipped topping
Keep refrigerated or partially frozen until serving; this prevents cake from becoming mushy
Drizzle hot fudge and caramel over individual slices rather than entire cake for better control
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Coach on assembling a frozen dessert cake with strategic layering and temperature management for proper texture.
